title: "New machine learning tool diagnoses electron beams in an efficient, non-invasive way"
excerpt: "For the past few years, researchers at the Department of Energy's SLAC National Accelerator Laboratory have been developing \"virtual diagnostics\" that use machine learning to obtain crucial information about beam quality in an efficient, non-invasive way."
